name: Dubwool
description: The Sheep Pokémon. Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You'll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: This Pokemon is vulnerable to fire-type moves, but takes half damage from any melee attack (that isn't fire-type).

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when this Pokémon fails a saving throw against a negative condition, it can choose to pass instead.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to damage from moves with Bullet, Ball, or Bomb in their name.
